item.title: Ansible SElinux Enforceing
item.description: snipset as selinux-enforceing.yaml - hosts: all user: root become_user: root become: yes serial: 1 tasks: - name: Edit SElinux-Config lineinfile: path: /etc/selinux/config regexp: '^SELINUX=' line: SELINUX=permissive - name: Reboot Host with Defaults reboot: - name: Wait for Host to be Available again wait_for_connection:
